body_html:
@gunan Could resolve the issue Unknown target CPU by using command provided by you in previous comment.

Build
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

bazel test command.

bazel --host_jvm_args="-Xms512m" --host_jvm_args="-Xmx1024m" test \
    --test_tag_filters=-gpu,-benchmark-test -k \
    --test_timeout 300,450,1200,3600 --build_tests_only \
    --test_output=errors -- \
    //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/compiler/... -//tensorflow/core/platform/s3/... -//tensorflow/core/platform/cloud/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/... -//tensorflow/contrib/cloud/...

Build
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
bazel test command.

body:
@gunan  Could resolve the issue `Unknown target CPU`  by using command provided by you in previous comment. 

Build
`bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

   
bazel test command. 
```
bazel --host_jvm_args="-Xms512m" --host_jvm_args="-Xmx1024m" test \
    --test_tag_filters=-gpu,-benchmark-test -k \
    --test_timeout 300,450,1200,3600 --build_tests_only \
    --test_output=errors -- \
    //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/compiler/... -//tensorflow/core/platform/s3/... -//tensorflow/core/platform/cloud/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/... -//tensorflow/contrib/cloud/... 
```
